message.content:
{"id": "2120", 
"title": "Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions", 
"description": "", 
"OB": "The bug is about the MRU File List not being persisted between sessions. When files are opened, they should appear in the File menu MRU list. However, currently, the files do not appear in the MRU list. This behavior should be changed so that the MRU File List is persisted between sessions. Note that we should be using the IPersistableElement and not peek into the implementation to get the underlying resource. The IEditorInput may not necessarily be a resource.", 
"EB": "", 
"SR": ""}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
